name: Substitution Risk Analysis
query: Model the aluminum substitution risk scenario where construction and grid infrastructure segments see 15% reduction in copper intensity. Compare this to the baseline scenario.
expected_behavior: Applies 15% coefficient reduction to construction and grid T&D segments
Leaves automotive and renewable segments unaffected (no substitution risk)
Shows total demand reduction of 6-8% compared to baseline
Identifies vulnerable segments: construction and grid T&D
Identifies protected segments: automotive BEV and wind/solar generation
Provides year-by-year comparison showing impact of substitution
